title: Curate a 'Back to School' Collection
description: A merchandiser wants to create a new curated collection page for a 'Back to School' campaign.

tasks.description: Create a new collection page titled 'Back to School'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new, empty collection page.

tasks.description: Add a list of specified products (SKUs for backpacks, notebooks, pens) to the collection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully populates the collection with the correct items.

tasks.description: Make the collection visible on the main navigation menu.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the site's navigation to include a link to the new collection.
